author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add analyzer to dump content of Muon SimHits (useful in establishing hits produced in dd4hep)

#### PR validation:

Used in the testing of SIM step with dd4hep

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gem55 Add analyzer to dump content of Muon SimHits
